answers.author: Megan Dale
answers.text:
Hi Abigail,
Not sure if this is exactly what you are looking for, but I asked a question about diversity initiatives a few months ago:  
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/22785/Evaluating_Diversity_Initiatives
Some of the respondents to that question might have good templates to share with you. Good luck!

author: Abigail Lundy
text: Hello! We have a city looking for templates to use as they craft a diversity plan for their community. Does anyone out there have a good sample (with practical strategies) that they could share? Thanks!
title: Templates for Diversity Plans
